TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MultipleViewPattern extends System.Windows.Automation.BasePattern

Docs.summary: Represents controls that provide, and are able to switch between, multiple representations of the same set of information or child controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Examples of controls that can present multiple views include the list view (which can show its contents as thumbnails, tiles, icons, or details), [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xl](~/includes/tlasharptla-xl-md.md)] charts (pie, line, bar, cell value with a formula), [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_word](~/includes/tlasharptla-word-md.md)] documents (normal, Web layout, print layout, reading layout, outline), [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_outlook](~/includes/tlasharptla-outlook-md.md)] calendar (year, month, week, day) and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wmp](~/includes/tlasharptla-wmp-md.md)] skins. The supported views are determined by the control developer and are specific to each control.

Docs.related: UI Automation Control Patterns for Clients

Docs.summary: Gets the cached [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for this .
Docs.value: A structure containing the cached [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for the control pattern.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Cached property values must have been previously requested using a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>. Use <xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern.Current%2A> to get the current value of a property.
For information on the properties available and their use, see <xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern.MultipleViewPatternInformation>.

Docs.exception: The requested property is not in the cache.

Docs.summary: Gets the current [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for this .
Docs.value: A structure containing the current [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for the control pattern.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This pattern must be from an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> with an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode.Full> reference in order to get current values. If the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> was obtained using <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode.None>, it contains only cached data, and attempting to get the current value of any property raises an exception. Use <xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern.Cached%2A> to get the cached value of a property that was previously specified using a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.
For information on the properties available and their use, see <xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern.MultipleViewPatternInformation>.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly CurrentViewProperty As AutomationProperty

remarks.format:
## Remarks This identifier is used by UI automation client applications. UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPatternIdentifiers>.
## Examples In the following example, an integer is obtained that represents the current view for a control that supports <xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern>.
[!code-csharp[UIAMultipleViewPattern_snip#100](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAMultipleViewPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAMultipleViewPattern_snippets.cs#100)] [!code-vb[UIAMultipleViewPattern_snip#100](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAMultipleViewPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAMultipleViewPattern_snippets.vb#100)] [!code-csharp[UIAMultipleViewPattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAMultipleViewPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAMultipleViewPattern_snippets.cs#103)] [!code-vb[UIAMultipleViewPattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAMultipleViewPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAMultipleViewPattern_snippets.vb#103)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance string GetViewName(int32 viewId) cil managed
Public Function GetViewName (viewId As Integer) As String

Docs.summary: Retrieves the name of a control-specific view.
Docs.returns: A localized string representing the control-specific view name.

remarks.format:
## Remarks View identifiers can be retrieved by using <xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern.MultipleViewPatternInformation.GetSupportedViews%2A>.
The control-specific collection of view identifiers is identical across instances.
View names are suitable for use in Text to Speech, Braille, and other accessible applications.
## Examples In the following example, the control-specific name of the current view is retrieved from a control that supports <xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern>.
[!code-csharp[UIAMultipleViewPattern_snip#105](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAMultipleViewPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAMultipleViewPattern_snippets.cs#105)] [!code-vb[UIAMultipleViewPattern_snip#105](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAMultipleViewPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAMultipleViewPattern_snippets.vb#105)]

Docs.exception: is not a member of the supported views collection.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Pattern As AutomationPattern

remarks.format:
## Remarks This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPatternIdentifiers>.
The pattern identifier is passed to methods such as <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A> to retrieve the control pattern of interest from the specified <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.
## Examples In the following example, a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern> control pattern is obtained from an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.
[!code-csharp[UIAMultipleViewPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAMultipleViewPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAMultipleViewPattern_snippets.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIAMultipleViewPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAMultipleViewPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAMultipleViewPattern_snippets.vb#101)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetCurrentView(int32 viewId) cil managed

remarks.format:
## Remarks View identifiers can be retrieved by using <xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern.MultipleViewPatternInformation.GetSupportedViews%2A>.
The control-specific collection of view identifiers is identical across instances.
## Examples In the following example, the collection of views available for a control that supports the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern> control pattern is retrieved. A member of the view identifiers collection is subsequently used to modify the current view of the control.
[!code-csharp[UIAMultipleViewPattern_snip#104](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAMultipleViewPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAMultipleViewPattern_snippets.cs#104)] [!code-vb[UIAMultipleViewPattern_snip#104](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAMultipleViewPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAMultipleViewPattern_snippets.vb#104)]

Docs.exception: is not a member of the supported views collection.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly SupportedViewsProperty As AutomationProperty

Docs.summary: Identifies the property that gets the control-specific collection of views.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This identifier is used by UI automation client applications. UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPatternIdentifiers>.
This property is not present in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern.MultipleViewPatternInformation> and must be retrieved by using <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPropertyValue%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCachedPropertyValue%2A>.
## Examples In the following example, a collection of integer identifiers is obtained that represents the current views available for a control that supports <xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern>.
[!code-csharp[UIAMultipleViewPattern_snip#100](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAMultipleViewPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAMultipleViewPattern_snippets.cs#100)] [!code-vb[UIAMultipleViewPattern_snip#100](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAMultipleViewPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAMultipleViewPattern_snippets.vb#100)] [!code-csharp[UIAMultipleViewPattern_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAMultipleViewPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAMultipleViewPattern_snippets.cs#102)] [!code-vb[UIAMultipleViewPattern_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAMultipleViewPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAMultipleViewPattern_snippets.vb#102)]
